lead_paragraph: Frank Lampard's loan spell at Manchester City is due to end in January but the Premier League champions might want to delay his departure across the Atlantic to enhance their chances of fighting his old club for the title.

headline.main: Lampard Proves to Be City's Trump Card Again
headline.print_headline: Lampard Proves to Be City's Trump Card Again

snippet: Frank Lampard's loan spell at Manchester City is due to end in January but the Premier League champions might want to delay his departure across the Atlantic to enhance their chances of fighting his old club for the title....
